Package com.cafean.client.anim

Class SourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.anim.SourceManager
  • public class SourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton manager for DataSource connections to remote sources of animatable data such as Calculation Servers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.Integer[] S_columnWidths
      An array containing the width of each column in the source manager table.
      java.util.LinkedList serverList
      The list of calculation servers.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addEuChangeListener​(java.lang.Object listener)
      Adds an EuChangeListener to the listener list.
      boolean canPlay()
      Returns true if the play button should be enabled.
      boolean canResume()
      Returns true if the resume button should be enabled.
      void clearCurrentModel()
      Clears the current model and cleans up the connections.
      void destroy()
      Destroy this source manager object, releasing all interface connections.
      void forward()
      Fast forwards the run to the end of the current runtime

      Retrieves the Animation model currently being animated by this source manager.

      Retrieves the singleton SourceManager instance.

      Retrieves the singleton SourceManager instance.

      Retrieves this SourceManager's master run, if one is available.
      double getMaxTimeValue()
      Gets the requested max time for recordings
      double getMinTimeValue()
      Gets the requested min time for recordings
      double getMovieEndTime()
      Gets the current bound on ending time for recordings
      double getMovieStartTime()
      Gets the current bound on starting time for recordings
      double getPlayTime()
      Return the current transient 'Real Time' used to run proportional to real time.
      TimeScale getTimeScale()  
      double getTimeStep()
      Return the time delta between timeslices for record mode.
      void incrementTimeslice​(int increment)
      Sets the current calculation time.

      returns true if any of the current animation model's data sources are active

      Return the paused state of the timer.
      void pause()
      Pause the display animation.
      void play()
      Resume the display animation.
      void plotVariables​(DataSource source, java.lang.String[] varNames, boolean clear)
      Plot a variable using the Xmgr5 interface.
      void record​(ViewComponent view)
      Record the display animation.
      void refresh()
      refreshes the current animation by re-registering the channels currently in use and calling incrementTimeslice(int) with 0 as the number of timeslices to increment.
      void refreshDataItems()
      Redraws all of the beans with the current data from the calculation server.
      void removeEuChangeListener​(java.lang.Object listener)
      Removes an EuChangeListener from the listener list.
      void resetPlayTime()
      Reset the displayed transient time to the beginning of the master calculation.
      void retreiveData​(boolean limitPlayRate)
      Retrieves the data from all of the active data sources.
      void reverse()
      Reverses to the minimum time step
      boolean sendPlotCommands​(java.lang.String[] commands)
      Sends the given commands to the source manager's Plot Tool instance.

      Sets the current calculation time.

      Sets the Animation model currently being animated by this source manager.
      void setTimeScale​(TimeScale scale)  
      void setUnitsType​(int units)
      Set the units type and notify all registered beans.
      void setUpdatePlayMode​(int mode)
      Sets the playback mode used by the PushUpdateThread as defined by PushUpdateThread.PLAY_ALL, PushUpdateThread.PLAY_LATEST, or PushUpdateThread.PLAY_RECORD.
      void showTimeControls()
      Display a dialog to allow the analysis time and replay rate to be modified.
      void stop()
      Halt the master run
      void stopRecord()  
      void updateDynamicRanges()
      Updates all of the dynamic ranges inside the model.
      void updateMaster()
      Periodically fired by the timer to query the master data source for new data.
      void updateSlaves()
      Update the slaved data sources to correspond to the current time of the master data source.

    • Field Detail

      • serverList

        public transient java.util.LinkedList serverList
        The list of calculation servers.

      • S_columnWidths

        public static transient java.lang.Integer[] S_columnWidths
        An array containing the width of each column in the source manager table.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SourceManager getInstance()
        Retrieves the singleton SourceManager instance. If no instance is available, a new instance is created with the ModelEditor's SnapPreferences.

      • getInstance

        public static SourceManager getInstance​(Configurator config)
        Retrieves the singleton SourceManager instance. If no instance is available, a new instance is created with the given Configurator.

      • getCurrentModel

        public AbstractModel getCurrentModel()
        Retrieves the Animation model currently being animated by this source manager.

      • clearCurrentModel

        public void clearCurrentModel()
        Clears the current model and cleans up the connections.

      • setCurrentModel

        public void setCurrentModel​(AbstractModel model)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Sets the Animation model currently being animated by this source manager. This method is the main entry point for connecting and disconnecting an Animation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getMasterRun

        public DataSource getMasterRun()
        Retrieves this SourceManager's master run, if one is available.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        returns true if any of the current animation model's data sources are active

      • showTimeControls

        public void showTimeControls()
        Display a dialog to allow the analysis time and replay rate to be modified.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause the display animation. Pause the active calculation if applicable.

      • reverse

        public void reverse()
        Reverses to the minimum time step

      • forward

        public void forward()
        Fast forwards the run to the end of the current runtime

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Halt the master run

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Return the paused state of the timer.

      • canResume

        public boolean canResume()
        Returns true if the resume button should be enabled.

      • canPlay

        public boolean canPlay()
        Returns true if the play button should be enabled. The play button can be used to initially start play or to resume the calculation if the end time has been reached in playback.

      • play

        public void play()
        Resume the display animation. Continue the active calculation if applicable.

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        refreshes the current animation by re-registering the channels currently in use and calling incrementTimeslice(int) with 0 as the number of timeslices to increment.

      • record

        public void record​(ViewComponent view)
        Record the display animation.

      • stopRecord

        public void stopRecord()

      • setUpdatePlayMode

        public void setUpdatePlayMode​(int mode)
        Sets the playback mode used by the PushUpdateThread as defined by PushUpdateThread.PLAY_ALL, PushUpdateThread.PLAY_LATEST, or PushUpdateThread.PLAY_RECORD.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroy this source manager object, releasing all interface connections.

      • resetPlayTime

        public void resetPlayTime()
        Reset the displayed transient time to the beginning of the master calculation.

      • getPlayTime

        public double getPlayTime()
        Return the current transient 'Real Time' used to run proportional to real time.

      • getTimeStep

        public double getTimeStep()
        Return the time delta between timeslices for record mode.

      • getTimeScale

        public TimeScale getTimeScale()

      • setTimeScale

        public void setTimeScale​(TimeScale scale)

      • updateMaster

        public void updateMaster()
        Periodically fired by the timer to query the master data source for new data.

      • updateSlaves

        public void updateSlaves()
        Update the slaved data sources to correspond to the current time of the master data source.

      • setUnitsType

        public void setUnitsType​(int units)
        Set the units type and notify all registered beans.
        Parameters:
        units - The units type, 0=SI, !0=British.

      • sendPlotCommands

        public boolean sendPlotCommands​(java.lang.String[] commands)
        Sends the given commands to the source manager's Plot Tool instance.
        Parameters:
        commands - a String[] containing a set of commands to send to the configured plot tool.
        Returns:
        TRUE unless an error occurs sending the command.

      • plotVariables

        public void plotVariables​(DataSource source,
                          java.lang.String[] varNames,
                          boolean clear)
        Plot a variable using the Xmgr5 interface.
        Parameters:
        source - The source identifier.
        varNames - The names of the variables to be plotted.
        clear - flag for clearing the existing channels before plotting.

      • addEuChangeListener

        public void addEuChangeListener​(java.lang.Object listener)
        Adds an EuChangeListener to the listener list.

      • removeEuChangeListener

        public void removeEuChangeListener​(java.lang.Object listener)
        Removes an EuChangeListener from the listener list.

      • incrementTimeslice

        public void incrementTimeslice​(int increment)
        Sets the current calculation time. This is clipped by the maximum and minimum values.

      • setCalcTime

        public void setCalcTime​(double t)
        Sets the current calculation time. This is clipped by the maximum and minimum values.

      • getMovieStartTime

        public double getMovieStartTime()
        Gets the current bound on starting time for recordings

      • getMovieEndTime

        public double getMovieEndTime()
        Gets the current bound on ending time for recordings

      • getMinTimeValue

        public double getMinTimeValue()
        Gets the requested min time for recordings

      • getMaxTimeValue

        public double getMaxTimeValue()
        Gets the requested max time for recordings

      • retreiveData

        public void retreiveData​(boolean limitPlayRate)
        Retrieves the data from all of the active data sources. If the run is being played back in realtime, the data will all be based on the current playtime.
        Parameters:
        limitPlayRate -

      • updateDynamicRanges

        public void updateDynamicRanges()
        Updates all of the dynamic ranges inside the model.

      • refreshDataItems

        public void refreshDataItems()
        Redraws all of the beans with the current data from the calculation server.
